name: World Soccer Pinball
description:
Enjoy World Soccer Pinball, choose your country and start the match to become the number 1 in the world.

Score goals and try not to make fouls on the playfield, get the highest possible score, become the MVP and win the match.

Discover all the secrets, complete all the missions and become best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

- Arcade design.

- Set at the soccer World Cup.

- Multiball, Extraball, Skillshot, Jackpots...

- Reproduction with all the details, lights and sounds.

- 4 different cameras to choose from.

- Vertical gameplay.

- Online Leaderboard.
